name: Natsuiro Kokoro Log
storyline:
One day, Yoshito was challenged by his senpai Kisara to a match in a fighting game. Even though he was confident in his skills, she was a top-ranked and beat him handily. As a result, he had to join the cyber-research club that she was the leader of. It was a relatively new club, but it soon became lively with the addition of his osananajimi and student council deputy leader Kuon, his dependable imouto Rin and classmate Kotone.

At the start of summer vacation, Yoshito was asked by the club’s advisor Kanae to help test out a love simulation game that’s in development. However, all the female avatars in the game were played by the girls in the cyber-research club! Once it was revealed that his avatar had an AI which mimicked his personality, they interacted with him in ways that they normally wouldn’t in real life. Traversing the line between reality and imagination, he could see the true feelings of the heroines who are not honest with their feelings. Their summer love story begins now.
summary:
The world of Natsuiro Kokoro Log is surrounded by romance, which is carried out through two different realities: the real world and what happens digitally. The simple explanation is that in the near future, virtual reality can be experienced by taking the Internet to an electronic world where everything seems much more real than you could imagine. The game presents a series of characters that you will meet in both worlds
Everything happens in summer, this means that you can participate in all kinds of events, such as sequences in the pool, summer festivals and other similar activities!
The illustrations and designs have been made by Shiromochi Sakura and Pero, while the story has the work of artists Itsukihara Shin and Fujii Rilke
